mapper.sql: id, member_id, name, area, service_time, experience, introduction, price, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM sitters
AND (name ILIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR introduction ILIKE '%' || #{search} || '%')
AND area = #{area}
ORDER BY price ASC
ORDER BY created_at DESC
ORDER BY (SELECT COALESCE(AVG(rating), 0) FROM sitter_reviews WHERE sitter_id = sitters.id) DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sitters (member_id, name, area, service_time, experience, introduction, price, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{name}, #{area}, #{serviceTime}, #{experience}, #{introduction}, #{price}, #{avatarUrl}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE sitters SET name = #{name}, area = #{area}, service_time = #{serviceTime}, experience = #{experience}, introduction = #{introduction}, price = #{price}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
